channel.title: Connecting not working
channel.description: I have tried to get my server to connect from another computer, but i can't get it to work..... I have tried the regular method of portforwarding, and have changed my client connection to my no-ip. It doesn't work. I tried utorrent. It says connection already started on port 43954 when i run my server..... Help!!!

item.title: Connecting not working
item.dc:creator: @daygen4545 daygen4545
item.description:
@daygen4545 wrote:

Lol yeah, I’m not a complete idiot, although I can’t figure out why I didn’t realize that in the first place…lol

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting not working
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

exit utorrent runserver open utorrent - problem solved

you have to portforward via utorrent after you have started to host your server otherwise anything using the port 43594/5555 before the server will say port is already in use hope this helps if you don’t understand what i mean ill explain in full detail but i believe that is an easy enough answer for you

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting not working

item.description:

I have tried to get my server to connect from another computer, but i can’t get it to work…
I have tried the regular method of portforwarding, and have changed my client connection to my no-ip.
It doesn’t work.
I tried utorrent.
It says connection already started on port 43954 when i run my server…
